title: What T-shirt printing company allows you to print around the sides of a shirt? - Quora

response.answer_text: My company CSP Contract Screen Printing can surely work with you on this project and get it done within specs you so desire. We are master discharge printers. We don't just say we print with discharge water base we have been for 25 years .Wrap around prints are great and look fantastic. http://www.cspcontractscreenprinting.com
